title: Nidalee spears
body:
Can riot please fix them? 

We havent had any notice from them except for the good ole comment how they said it doesn't effect many people  which is why they wont disable her, I am one of those players who CANT see her spears 

And it is frustrating (I see her wind up, then when the spear reaches its end point I see it, but I dont see its travel direction or path) 
Its quite annoying that it still isnt fixed.... not really a rant thread because I dont see nid in ranked that much but still it is still out there for me, is there any progress on fixing those invis spears?

replies.body:
As far as I know, there seem to be many different causes for invisible skillshots (the invisible projectile bug affects quite a few different projectiles, including Mundo Q, Ezreal Q, and Corki R). They've been able to fix some of the causes, but the bug keeps coming back for some reason.

EDIT: Also, most likely if Riot ever does find the root cause of the bug and fix it, they probably won't mention it, since it's such a persistent bug and often for these types of bugs, they won't mention it unless they're absolutely confident that they fixed it. If you've ever done any programming, you'll know bugfixing is like 99% of the work; it's not exactly easy, especially with a system as complicated as the game has become
riot could disable every skillshot champ for emergency server fixes but that would mean ALL of the champions would be disabled. end of joke
Every game is just Ryze, Vayne, Poppy and Xin Zhao. Anyone think of any others?
Might as well be all the damn champs....
Alistar, Garen, Jax, Katarina, Kayle, Nunu, Rammus, Taric, and Teemo I believe also qualify.
MORDEHUE
Yeah Ive had issues with invis-cleavers before, but they fixed that one, the insane damage on nida spear sucks though when I cant dodge it as effectively

For the 100th time this bug exists with all projectiles in the game currently. (Not just Nid)

They can't just disable all the affect champions because they don't have any idea how to reproduce the bug, so they can't even begin to figure out what is causing the problem.

They aren't just sitting there laughing there asses off at us while we get miserable. As much as I hate Nid it isn't fair to players that like her to just keep her disabled for a long period of time despite the bug affecting others and not that many others mind you.

Reminder that they had Shen disabled for generations because his ult wouldn't work 1 in 1,000,000 times, but they still haven't disabled Nidalee despite her 1 in 20 odds of having invisible spears for an entire game.
/thread

I like how everyone always cries about "inbisible spears", except in my ~4 years of playing this game, I've never seen a single invisible spear. So, unless you have actual evidence, please stop these posts.
There is enough proof around. Go look for it, and please, stop these comment(s)

> [{quoted}](name=Muz689,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uaTO4Tyi,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-04-19T02:53:11.416+0000)
>
> There is enough proof around. Go look for it, and please, stop these comment(s)

There's also proof that cats can fly..just look around don't deny it just go look for it :^)
Gotta provide proof, not say "just look for it".

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P7a836M88Pk 

0:11- 0:15. Proof of a invisible spear. All you see is her in cougar form going straight at Lissandra _as if she has threw her "visible" spear_. while you are at it, prove that cats can fly, dont worry just look for it =). BTW the date of the youtube video is quite near to the time where posts were made about invis. spear or close to it. I can look for more. But ill stay with this unless more is needed. If you are joking around.... i have nothing else to say.

> [{quoted}](name=Muz689,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uaTO4Tyi,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-20T04:09:13.997+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P7a836M88Pk 
> 
> 0:11- 0:15. Proof of a invisible spear. All you see is her in cougar form going straight at Lissandra _as if she has threw her "visible" spear_. while you are at it, prove that cats can fly, dont worry just look for it =). BTW the date of the youtube video is quite near to the time where posts were made about invis. spear or close to it. I can look for more. But ill stay with this unless more is needed. If you are joking around.... i have nothing else to say.

Then I guess I was wrong. But that's not unique to Nidalee. Many skillshots thrown from the fog of war show as inviisble, it's a game wide bug.
True. Most devastating is nidalee though.
just saying, if you had "seen" an invisible spear, it wouldn't have been invisible. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Xys,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uaTO4Tyi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-19T01:42:12.564+0000)
>
> I like how everyone always cries about "inbisible spears", except in my ~4 years of playing this game, I've never seen a single invisible spear. So, unless you have actual evidence, please stop these posts.

There is plenty of evidence, just go look at the bug thread, plenty of posts and pics with the invisible spears. The issue has been around for quite some time now.
_Buy a pink_
{{item:3362}} this is my chance!

If they decide to fix this "issue", why don't they nerf those spears? Their damage is insane, and Nidalee's carry potential is way too overpowered. I think that they should scale with something like 70% AP...

They were already nerfed

Proof that the nidalee haters are just bads
Nids base health was lowered and you call that a nerf?

She had a minor rework, part of which greatly reduced her spear damage

but that's not gonna stop people from eating spears becaues they can't dodge the slowest projectile in the game
ive also seen invisible ahri charms, mundo cleavers. ive seen also corki rockets, thresh hooks and jinx and ez ulti going straight thru their enemies. i dont get it lol
they fixed the mundo cleaver issue and as for ez ulti the hitbox on it is super small now :c

I've had this issue.
The spear still glows like normal.
So you people are full of shit saying you can't see it.

I play on like 20-60 fps and see it just fine on low settings
Get your eyes checked.

As I stated my problem is, I see her throw it IE the attack animation, then it goes away then reappears right before it hits its max range

now this might not constitute as a true invis spear, I still want it back to normal

all im seeing is downvotes and excuses for poor mechanics.
If I can dodge nidalee spears with FPS lag in teamfights then you can too.

Don't make excuses. 
Just get better at clicking near your champion instead of half a mile away.
You sound so dumb that I'm really thinking you are trolling. You sound like the true Toxicity Incarnation.

Reading =/= Hearing
Insult me not the language, please.

English is not my mother language and I was not sure about how to express the feeling that you get when you read someone, so I used the verb "sound" that is easily understandable anyways. Don't pretend to be a bully, you scare noone.

If you've nothing interesting to discuss why even reply to me? 
Wasting both our time.
I wanted to know if you were trolling or just plain bully wannabe. Everything is gonna be okay, buddy.

I cant dodge something i dont see coming unless Im very lucky imagine you see something thrown in your general direction, then it will dissapear until it reaches its end how am I supposed to know what way the spear goes when all I see is her hands moving and hear the "raghr!" of a spear throw then all of a sudden I see a spear hit me (part of the "Hit!" animation not the actual spear projectile itself)

It has a glow around it that is a red glow if you have colorblind mode on.
Like I said, it's not hard to point out and avoid.

implying everyone has colorblind mode on

also implying players should be forced to have colorblind mode on because of a bug

We're reporting a bug here, dude.

It happens. Sometimes you can't dodge the spear because of a bug that makes it invisible.

How about you stop making excuses to be an ass? Or can I pink ward that?
You could go play Smite where every AOE ability is larger than its visible circle
THEY SHOULD NERF SPEARS TO 21 SECONDS LIKE RAMMUS TAUNT SO WE'RE NOT DODGING ONE EVERY 5 SECONDS.
this would be wonderful
I have noticed it most when she spears from another level of terrain
her spears arent invisable for me at all, they just always hit me through minions
I'm having the same issue. It definitely needs to be fixed.
